title: Rats
description: Asset adds rats to your project
longDescription:
The Rats asset includes a low poly rat model, an advanced AI and rats navigation system, and 4 blueprints to control rats in different ways.


Controlling rats involves

  • Simply running from point A to point B
  • Running along the navigation points arranged by location
  • Spawn rats in a sandbox
  • Traveling Sandbox - Allows rats to travel in packs over long distances


More details can be found in Rats overview and tutorial

Tech info: Here


All blueprints have a rat spawn trigger - when the player crosses the trigger, rats spawn

Rats react to the player and try to avoid him

Rats can independently jump over small obstacles, jump on the surface and jump off them

Rats can be constantly in the location or temporarily - at the end of the set timer, they hide

Each rat uses only 1 (own) blueprint and animation blueprint. Blackboard, Behavior tree, Event ticks, Sensors or similar systems are not used.

When determining an obstacle, the rat calculates the height of the obstacle, the force of the jump, the slope of the surface, and even the point of its landing even before it starts moving. This is a pretty smart rat.

The included content can be modified, edited, and used in your projects, including commercial ones.


Created special for gaming experience
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Smart rats AI
  • 4 systems to control rats
  • 1k poly mesh (+ generated LODs up to 200 poly)
  • performance safe navigation system
  • Dynamic rat color settings (Original color brown, and white, gray and black rats can be added to the rat pack)
  • Baked 2k textures is special UE4 pack ( _D _N and _R _M _AO in RGB). Textures baked from high poly model + xGen groom
  •  12 animation. Animations are pre-configured and used in blueprints
  • Configured physic asset


Number of Blueprints: 5 (4 for different controls systems and 1 rat character)

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes



If you have any questions or suggestions - feel free: Jagamaker@gmail.com
